events.message: I received my new blender yesterday but it arrived with a broken blade and does not work at all.
The reported problem has been categorized under Product Defect due to the broken blade issue.
An agent has been assigned to handle the report regarding the defective blender unit.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the broken blender blade you received.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged blender blade and the packaging it came in?
Here are the photos showing the broken blade and the box, which looks slightly crushed on one side.
We will send you a replacement blender immediately and arrange for the defective one to be picked up at no extra cost.
Thank you for the quick solution. I appreciate the replacement and the pickup service.
Your request is now resolved with a replacement shipped and pickup scheduled for the defective product.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received the replacement blender and that everything is working fine.
Yes, I received the new blender and it works perfectly. Thanks again for your help!
We are closing your case now. Please contact us if you need any further assistance in the future.
